title: Justin Bieber jokes around with Hailey Baldwin as she scratches car
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin have barely been married a week but they’ve already hit a bump after the model somehow managed to make a dent in the wheels of husband Justin’s car.

Hailey managed to scratch the wheels of Justin’s pink Lamborghini, however, luckily, he doesn’t seem to be too fussed by the whole ordeal.

In fact, he decided to take the opportunity to joke about it.

Taking to Instagram stories, the singer shared a series of videos as he playfully moaned at his wife for ruining his vehicle.

‘What did you do? What did you do?’ he questioned.

Hailey subsequently apologised, as she stressed that she could ‘fix’ the problem while looking down at the damage done to which her partner cheekily responded: ‘Dang, you’re freaking cute, and you’ve got pigtails’, as he played with her hair.

‘It’s a bad scratch,’ Hailey reassured her husband.

Hailey managed to scratch the wheels in Justin’s vehicle (Picture: Instagram)

It comes following the couple’s lavish wedding ceremony earlier in the week on 30 September, after previously marrying in a religious ceremony in a New York courthouse the previous week.

Justin and Hailey reportedely said ‘I do’ to 154 guests at a ceremony held at the Montage Palmetto Bluff hotel in South Carolina.

Celebrity pals among attendance at the wedding included Kylie and Kendall Jenner, Katy Perry, Jaden Smith and Justin’s manager Scooter Braun.

Justin took the opportunity to joke about Hailey’s pigtails (Picture: Instagram)

E! News reported that the ceremony was conducted by Justin’s pastor, Judah Smith, while Hailey’s bridesmaids were sister Alaia Baldwin and cousin Ireland Baldwin.

An insider also later added to People that the guests were handed drinks prior to the chapel ceremony, before enjoying a cocktail hour ahead of the reception, which took place at the resort’s ballroom.

Hailey reassured her husband it was a ‘bad scratch’ (Picture: Instagram)

It was reportedly a ‘dream come true’ for Hailey to marry the singer, according to a source from People.

‘Marrying Justin is Hailey’s dream come true,’ the source claimed. ‘She’s always had a crush on him and she was so happy and excited when they got a bit older and dated.’

In the meantime, Justin has also released some new music – in the form of country single 10,000 Hours with the American country duo Dan and Shay, with the hitmaker previously teasing that the song was ‘wedding music’.
